# Abbreviations {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false
#| output: false

library(here)
source(here::here("R/quarto-setup.R"))
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

quarto_status("polishing")
```

* __~F~__: Subscript indicating a relation with work-free days
* __~W~__: Subscript indicating a relation with workdays
* __BT__: Local time of going to bed
* __HO__: Horne & Ostberg's morningness-eveningness questionnaire (same as _MEQ_)
* __MCTQ__: Munich ChronoType Questionnaire
* __MCTQ^PT^__: Portuguese version of the MCTQ.
* __MEQ__: Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire
* __MSF~sc~__: Chronotype proxy. The midpoint between sleep onset and sleep end on work-free days. A sleep correction (~SC~) is made when a possible sleep compensation related to a lack of sleep on workdays is identified.
* __PRC__: Phase response curve
* __SD__: Sleep duration
* __SE__: Sleep end
* __SJL__: Social Jetlag
* __SO__: Sleep onset
* __SPrep__: Local time of preparing to sleep
